All Implemented Interfaces:
AssetCache
public class MemoryAssetCache
extends AbstractAssetCache

Service provider for AssetCache that uses SimpleLruCaches as stores.

Since:
0.10.0
Author:
Thibault Duchateau, Romain Lespinasse
